channel.title: Program on mLogger

item.title: Flutter Matters
item.description: issue: Waiting for another flutter command to release the startup lock solution: cd $FLUTTERPATH/cache rm lockfile file try it again issue: linked and embedded framework ‘App.framework’ not satisfied Building for iOS, but the linked and embedded framework ‘App.framework’ was built for iOS Simulator. Building for iOS Simulator, but the linked and embedded framework ‘App.framework’ was built for iOS. solution: see this issue: Use Flutter In China solution: Add two variables in your shell environment file
